data.title: Microsoft Azure Marketplace
data.text:
Your favourite development tools are always up to date

With the Eficode ROOT DevOps platform hosted in Microsoft Azure, your development tools are always available and up to date with single support contact. Finally, you can focus on improving your DevOps culture. Eficode ROOT includes proactive tool maintenance and on-demand support for more than 60 tools for CI/CD, Git, Infrastructure, and Security. Migrations and integrations are made easy, and the Eficode ROOT team knows how to help you with the individual tools.

1. Focus on the essential

Managing your toolchain takes time at the expense of developing new projects. The Eficode ROOT platform and ROOT team can manage your toolchain - for you to focus on the essentials and speed up time-to-market. While developers are happy and improve software quality, the management enhances time to market and customer satisfaction.

2. Agile access management

With a centralized self-service access management system and a single, intuitive user interface, you can now simplify and delegate team and permission management. Project managers can oversee project-level permission management, add users to projects without contacting your IT administrators, or even move permissions from one development team to another. Eficode ROOT Team Management - integrates seamlessly with existing customer access control infrastructure (such as Active Directory, Azure AD, or LDAP) and other tools such as Atlassianâ€™s Jira Software.

3. Boost your confidence & security

Security is a critical requirement for many organizations. Eficode has passed the ISO 27001 audit, an international standard for the needs of an Information Security Management System (ISMS). ISAE 3402 type 2 (SOC 1 type 2), an international assurance standard, is also available for Eficode ROOT customers.
